data.title: Grave Digger!?
data.meta_description: For Fallout 2 on the PC, a GameFAQs message board topic titled "Grave Digger!?".
data.text:
Cless929 15 years ago#1

umm I dug up a grave thinking some money was in it and well it was beer and I was sadly dissapointed. Well I check my stats and my title is grave digger.......can I get rid of this or will it mess up some quests? I heard this game can be quite unforgiving am I screwed?

http://i.imgflip.com/1lo7h.gif

Turoko 15 years ago#2

I was able to do all the quests with the gravedigger title, even the Woody quest in the den.

SoIidLegacy 15 years ago#3

There are 2 graves in the entire game which you can dig up once without getting slammed with the Grave Digger title and those are connected to good deeds. If you dig up any other grave(s), the game will assume you're doing this out of greed and your character will carry the title of Grave Digger for life. This won't affect your game all too much, except it will give you a -5 penalty to your Karma per grave you dug.

Choco: why are americans so weird

omniryu: To make a long story short, self esteem issue.

I thought you got grave digger when you LOOTED a grave. not just digging it up.

If the next one is called, because of his MO, the underwear bomber, you'll know I'm on to something. Calvin Trillin June 16, 2006.

SoIidLegacy 15 years ago#5

Digging is enough to get the title. Plus to answer another unasked question; no, there's nothing to loot in those 2 'legal' graves.

Choco: why are americans so weird

omniryu: To make a long story short, self esteem issue.

iforgotnmyname 15 years ago#6

Grave Digger has no negative effect in game. It may or may not be mentioned anywhere, but it won't stop you from doing things like being a Slaver or Childkiller will.

In fact, in Killap's restoration patch, being a Grave Digger is one way you can solve a quest, or at least get a certain reaction out of somebody.

The only other thing to note is that there is a -10 karma penalty for each grave dug up.

So dig away.

Yes i am insane. Abnormally insane though. For that reason i can keep my sanity.
